# isNull

> Test if a value is null.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var isNull = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-null' );
```

#### isNull( value )

Tests if a `value` is `null`.

``` javascript
var bool = isNull( null );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples


``` javascript
var isNull = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-null' );

bool = isNull( null );
// returns true

bool = isNull( 'beep' );
// returns false

bool = isNull( 5 );
// returns false

bool = isNull( undefined );
// returns false

bool = isNull( true );
// returns false

bool = isNull( {} );
// returns false

bool = isNull( [] );
// returns false

bool = isNull( function foo(){} );
// returns false
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
